prologue_003.name: Hunter's License
prologue_003.description: Obtain your official hunter's license and join the Hunter's Association.

dialogue.speaker: Association Staff
dialogue.text: Welcome to the Hunter's Association. Here's your E-rank license.

dialogue.speaker: Sung Jin-Woo
dialogue.text: Finally... I'm officially a hunter. Time to prove myself.

cartenon_temple_001.name: The Cartenon Temple
cartenon_temple_001.description: Enter the mysterious Cartenon Temple and face the trials within.

dialogue.speaker: System
dialogue.text: WARNING: High-level magical energy detected. Proceed with caution.

dialogue.speaker: Sung Jin-Woo
dialogue.text: This place... it's different from other dungeons. The mana here is ancient.

dialogue.speaker: Temple Voice
dialogue.text: Only the worthy may pass. Prove your strength, young hunter.

demon_castle_001.name: Demon Castle Entrance
demon_castle_001.description: Approach the foreboding Demon Castle and face its outer defenses.

dialogue.speaker: System
dialogue.text: DANGER: Demonic energy levels are extremely high. Retreat is advised.

dialogue.speaker: Sung Jin-Woo
dialogue.text: I've come too far to turn back now. These demons... they're strong.

dialogue.speaker: Demon Guard
dialogue.text: No mortal shall pass into our lord's domain!

red_gate_001.name: Red Gate Emergency
red_gate_001.description: Respond to a Red Gate emergency and save trapped hunters.

dialogue.speaker: Trapped Hunter
dialogue.text: Help! We've been trapped here for days! The cold is killing us!

dialogue.speaker: Sung Jin-Woo
dialogue.text: Don't worry. I'll get you all out of here safely.

dialogue.speaker: System
dialogue.text: New skill unlocked: Shadow Exchange. Use it to save the hunters.

shadow_monarch_001.name: Shadow Monarch Awakening
shadow_monarch_001.description: Embrace your true nature as the Shadow Monarch and command the army of the dead.
objectives: Accept your role as Shadow Monarch

dialogue.speaker: System
dialogue.text: You have awakened as the true Shadow Monarch. Your power is now limitless.

dialogue.speaker: Sung Jin-Woo
dialogue.text: I understand now. This is my destiny. I am the Shadow Monarch.

dialogue.speaker: Beru
dialogue.text: My liege! Your loyal servant Beru is at your command!

double_dungeon_001.name: The Double Dungeon Discovery
double_dungeon_001.description: Enter the mysterious double dungeon that will change your fate forever.

dialogue.speaker: System
dialogue.text: Welcome, Player. You have been selected to participate in the System.

dialogue.speaker: Sung Jin-Woo
dialogue.text: What is this? A system? This isn't like any dungeon I've seen before...

first_reawakening_001.name: Proving Your Strength
first_reawakening_001.description: Show the world that you're no longer the weakest hunter.

dialogue.speaker: Hunter Association Staff
dialogue.text: Impossible... Jin-Woo cleared a C-rank dungeon alone?

dialogue.speaker: Sung Jin-Woo
dialogue.text: I'm not the same person I was before. I've grown stronger.

jeju_island_001.name: Jeju Island Raid
jeju_island_001.description: Lead the raid to reclaim Jeju Island from the ant colony.

dialogue.speaker: Sung Jin-Woo
dialogue.text: This island has suffered long enough. Today, we take it back.

dialogue.speaker: Ant Queen
dialogue.text: You dare challenge the queen of this domain?!

dialogue.speaker: Beru
dialogue.text: My liege, allow me to handle these insects!

monarchs_war_001.name: War of the Monarchs
monarchs_war_001.description: Face the other Monarchs in the ultimate battle for supremacy.

dialogue.speaker: Beast Monarch
dialogue.text: So, the Shadow Monarch finally shows himself. Let us settle this!

dialogue.speaker: Sung Jin-Woo
dialogue.text: I won't let you destroy this world. This ends here!

dialogue.speaker: Dragon Emperor
dialogue.text: You think you can stand against the might of dragons?!

final_battle_001.name: The Last Stand
final_battle_001.description: The ultimate battle for humanity's survival against the final enemy.

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: You have interfered with my design for the last time, Shadow Monarch.

dialogue.speaker: Sung Jin-Woo
dialogue.text: I'll protect this world and everyone in it, no matter the cost!

dialogue.speaker: System
dialogue.text: Final battle initiated. All limiters removed. Fight with everything you have!

prologue.name: Prologue: The Weakest Hunter
prologue.description: Begin your journey as the world's weakest E-rank hunter.

double_dungeon.name: Chapter 1: The Double Dungeon
double_dungeon.description: The fateful encounter that changes everything.

first_reawakening.name: Chapter 2: First Reawakening
first_reawakening.description: Prove your newfound strength to the world.

cartenon_temple.name: Chapter 3: Cartenon Temple
cartenon_temple.description: Face the trials of the ancient temple.

red_gate.name: Chapter 5: Red Gate Crisis
red_gate.description: Save trapped hunters from a deadly Red Gate.

shadow_monarch.name: Chapter 6: Shadow Monarch
shadow_monarch.description: Embrace your destiny as the Shadow Monarch.

jeju_island.name: Chapter 7: Jeju Island Raid
jeju_island.description: Lead the raid to reclaim Jeju Island from the ants.

monarchs_war.name: Chapter 8: War of the Monarchs
monarchs_war.description: Face the other Monarchs in epic battles.

final_battle.name: Final Chapter: The Last Stand
final_battle.description: The ultimate battle for humanity's survival.
